title: Agent经济：市场、数字分身与代理社交网络
summary: Agent将替你生活——社交、谈判、筛选。Agent身份、支付、声誉和代理社交网络的基础设施是下一个平台级机会。

title: 愿景：构建真正理解你的AI
summary: 为什么现有AI伴侣都失败了，以及如何通过记忆编排、多Agent架构和对话式人格建模构建一个真正理解你的AI伴侣。

title: The Agent Economy: Marketplaces, Digital Twins, and Proxy Social Networks
summary: Agents will live your life for you — socializing, negotiating, filtering. The infrastructure for agent identity, payment, reputation, and proxy social networks is the next platform play.

title: Wearables Are the Nervous System of AI Companions
summary: AI companions need a sensory system. Wearables — rings, pendants, bracelets disguised as fashion — give AI the ability to feel what you're feeling and shift from reactive to proactive care.

title: 可穿戴设备：AI伴侣的神经系统
summary: AI伴侣需要感知系统。可穿戴设备——伪装成时尚饰品的戒指、吊坠、手链——赋予AI感受你感受的能力，从被动回应转为主动关怀。

title: The Companion Vision: Building AI That Truly Understands You
summary: Why AI companions fail today and how to build one that truly understands you through memory orchestration, multi-agent architecture, and conversational personality modeling.

title: What I Learned Shipping a Real Product as a Solo AI-Augmented Developer
summary: Part 3 of 3: Honest lessons from building PanPanMao. AI bridging domain knowledge (with caveats), product vs engineering, the agentic coding workflow, and the era of the solo AI-augmented builder.

title: Why I Built an AI Fortune-Telling App With Zero Domain Knowledge
summary: Part 1 of 3: A big-tech engineer's journey into building PanPanMao -- an AI-powered Chinese metaphysics platform with 9 verticals, 1,134 commits in 29 days, and zero domain knowledge.

title: From 5 Standalone Apps to a Unified Platform in 29 Days
summary: Part 2 of 3: The technical build of PanPanMao across 4 phases -- monorepo consolidation, testing and branding, monetization, and the milestone rush. 1,134 commits, 85 endpoints, 9 verticals.

title: Day 29: What I Learned Building a Product I Know Nothing About
summary: PanPanMao build diary final entry: 29 days, 1,134 commits, 9 product verticals. Reflections on AI-augmented development, zero-knowledge domains, and the product vs engineering divide.

title: Day 27: 98 Commits and Three New Products
summary: PanPanMao build diary Day 27: The most productive single day. 98 commits. Three new products (child naming, compatibility analysis, annual forecast) from zero to production.

title: Days 20-23: Shipping M1, M2, M3 in Four Days
summary: PanPanMao build diary Days 20-23: 166 commits, 3 formal milestones, 17 PRs. Credit economy foundation, Daily Hub with pre-generated content, and PostHog analytics.

title: Days 12-19: Credit Economy, New Features, and the Feature Explosion
summary: PanPanMao build diary Days 12-19: Referral system, palm reading with MediaPipe, landing page dark luxury redesign, and the realization that engineering is the easy part now.

title: Days 5-10: From Code to Product (Testing, Landing Page, and the Cat Theme)
summary: PanPanMao build diary Days 5-10: Vitest testing sprint, the birth of the PanPanMao cat brand, landing page design, Stripe integration, and credit economy with dried fish treats.

title: Days 2-4: The Monorepo Migration Sprint (111 Commits in 3 Days)
summary: PanPanMao build diary Days 2-4: CSS restoration hell, extracting shared packages, adding MBTI app, WeChat browser detection, and the unified API layer with 52 migrated routes.

title: Day 1: Why I'm Building a Fortune-Telling App (And I Know Nothing About Fortune-Telling)
summary: PanPanMao build diary Day 1: Starting a Chinese metaphysics AI platform with zero domain knowledge. 21 commits, monorepo setup, and the hypothesis that AI can bridge any knowledge gap.
